events.message: I recently received my order but the product arrived with a large scratch on the surface, which is really disappointing.
The reported issue involving a damaged or scratched product has been categorized under Product Defect for further handling.
The issue has been assigned to a customer service representative specialized in product quality concerns.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the condition of your product. I'll do my best to help resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched area and confirm if the packaging was damaged upon delivery?
I have attached the pictures showing the scratches clearly. The box was slightly dented but not torn or badly crushed.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product at no extra cost or a partial refund if you prefer to keep it.
I would like to receive a replacement, please. Thanks for the quick response and the helpful options.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 2 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
We just wanted to check if the replacement product arrived in good condition and meets your expectations.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and it is perfect. Thank you so much for your help and quick service!
We are glad to hear that your issue has been resolved. If you need any further assistance, feel free to contact us anytime.
